settings.heading: CC Belly, Harmonize Your Health
settings.subheading: Your gut health is the key to overall well-being. Elevate your wellness to new heights by boosting your gut health and potentially reduce the risk of chronic diseases.

settings.quote_text: All chronic diseases of the western world are associated with an unhealthy gut microbiome.
settings.quote_author: Dr. Justin Sonnenburg, PhD. Stanford Medicine

settings.quote_text: The intestine may play a key role in our decision-making process.
settings.quote_author: Dr. Sarkis Mazmanian, PhD. Caltech Med.

settings.quote_text: Microbiome is so integrated in all aspects of health, including mental health.
settings.quote_author: Dr. Erica Sonnenburg, PhD. Stanford Medicine.

settings.quote_text: We actually harbor more microbes in our body than we have human cells.
settings.quote_author: Dr. Justin Sonnenburg, PhD. Stanford Medicine.

settings.quote_text: Molecules in the gut microbiome cross the blood-brain barrier and change how we think
settings.quote_author: Dr. Sarkis Mazmanian, PhD. Caltech Med

settings.quote_text: The good news is we can actually heal our gut.

settings.text: As Harvard research shows, your gut is your second brain, controlling much more than digestion. A healthy gut lies at the core of your overall well-being.

settings.question_5: How do I store my Suppies?
settings.answer_5: For best results, keep your gummies in a cool, dry place. You don’t need to refrigerate them, but avoid leaving them in direct sunlight or extreme heat.
